sentences.en: Eventually I discovered I a talent for sales , and was hired by a Swedish housewares corporation.
sentences.cn: 我发现我善于推销, 便进入一家瑞典人开的家庭用品公司工作.

sentences.en: Eventually I discovered I had a talent fora Swedish housewares corporation.
sentences.cn: 我发现自己善于推销,便进入了一家瑞典人开的家庭用品公司工作.

sentences.en: I went to Milan to attend an international housewares show.
sentences.cn: 我去意大利米兰参观国际家庭用品展览.

sentences.en: Is another company currently exhibiting your product at the International Home & Housewares Show ? 7.
sentences.cn: 目前是否有别的公司在芝加哥家庭 用品 展上展出你们公司的产品?

sentences.en: It is so strange to see pieces of furniture housewares and numerous photos with no people around.
sentences.cn: 在空无一人的地方看着这些家具、生活用品和照片，感觉是如此诡异。

sentences.en: Products wanted: All kinds of home appliances, health products and plastic housewares.
sentences.cn: 需要货品: 各种类别的家庭电器 、 保健用品及塑胶的家庭用品.

sentences.en: Products wanted: Housewares, toys and general merchandise.
sentences.cn: 需要货品: 家庭用品 、 玩具及一般商品.

sentences.en: The houses were left in haste and all the things were abandoned. It is so strange to see pieces of furniture, housewares and numerous photos with no people around.
sentences.cn: 匆忙中人们抛下了房子，任何东西都不可以带走。在空无一人的地方看着这些家具、生活用品和照片，感觉是如此诡异。

trans.tran_en: small things used in the home, for example plates, lamps etc, or the department of a large shop that sells these things
